channel.title: Help me with 3 problems please and thanks :)
channel.description:
I need help with 2 things,
1: I want to make a forum moderator crown which i did http://prntscr.com/5eqd09 How do i add it ingame i want to give forum moderator rank rights = 2 and mods rank rights = 3 and admin+ 4 how can i apply this crown to rank 2?
2: When i try to compile the client or source this shows ? can you help me fix it please i really love this client and source but how do i compile?
http://prntscr.com/5eqcaq
3: how can i remove this gate? i want to remove a whole bunch of items in camelot so i can make it home but i just need to know how to remove 1 so i can remove rest please help me :) http://prntscr.com/5eqec0

item.title: Help me with 3 problems please and thanks :)
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

  1. Too add a new rank in-game with crowns you can follow this simple tutorial.

Adding Crowns Tutorial

  1. Your compiler is working fine. You can check this by changing a simple welcome message, saving and compiling the server and seeing if the message if successfully changed.

  2. For removing the gate, make sure your player-rights is set to 3 click on the gate, observe your cmd for the server it should output an ObjectID, x, y, z.

Take these and add them to the simple line.

Make sure you add this to ObjectManager.java under:
public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {

Read full topic
